CardData.FlavorText:
<line-height=100%><size=200%>T</size>he tower has proven home to all manner of foul villains, but you have bested each in your quest to save Bilbo. Yet all that has come before hasn't prepared you for the figure who emerges from the shadows now. 
<indent=50></indent>A cold smile flickers beneath the stranger's hood as he steps toward you. He moves with liquid grace, his advance almost hypnoticâ€”and a fatal distraction, you realize almost too late, as his sword slashes at you in a deadly arc!
